sn45.25:1: At Sāvatthī. "Bhikkhus, I will teach you the inferior person and the superior person. Listen to that …
sn45.25:2: "And what, bhikkhus, is the superior person? Here someone is of right view, right intention, right speech,sn.v.0right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right concentration. This is called the superior person."
